channel.title: Homebrewing on Taubin Drinks Beer
channel.description: Recent content in Homebrewing on Taubin Drinks Beer

item.title: HBW April 15 2015
item.author: admin@taubindrinks.beer (Dustin Plunkett)
item.description: It’s Wednesday, and that means, Home Brew Wednesday! In this HBW episode, I talk about my latest (as of yet un-named) beer, the Vanilla Java Stout, as well as a couple of the things that didn’t go entirely right with brewing this time around. Hold on to your shoelaces, it’s HBW for April 15th. Cheers!
